SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc12
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Model.Server

Class InGamePlayer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Model.Player
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Model.Server.InGamePlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Listenable, Serializable
public class InGamePlayer extends Player implements Listenable
Represents a player who is currently in a game.

This class extends the basic Player class to include attributes and methods specific to a player who is in a game. It maintains the player's hand of cards, their owned resources, their field, their secret objective, and their points. Additionally, it keeps track of the player's activity or inactivity due to network or voluntary disconnections.

The class also implements the Listenable interface to allow for registering, removing, and notifying listeners about various in-game events such as card placements, addition of card in hand and secret objective related updates.

See Also:

    • placeCard

      protected void placeCard(GenericPair<Integer,Integer> coordinates, PlayableCard card, Side playedSide) throws CardNotInHandException, NotEnoughResourcesException, InvalidCardPositionException
      Places a card from the player's hand onto their field at the specified coordinates. Updates the player's points and resources based on the card's placement. After being placed, if the given card covers corners of other cards which contains resources, their amount is decremented.
      Parameters:
      coordinates - The pair of coordinates where the card should be placed.
      card - The card to place.
      playedSide - The side of the card that is played.
      Throws:
      CardNotInHandException - if the card is not in the player's hand while trying to place it.
      NotEnoughResourcesException - if the player does not have enough resources to play a GoldCard.
      InvalidCardPositionException - if the card cannot be placed at the specified coordinates.

    • addCardToHand

      public void addCardToHand(PlayableCard pickedCard)
      Adds the specified card to this player's hand.

      This method adds the given card to the player's hand and notifies all registered listeners about the new card addition with a ReceiveCardCommand.

      Parameters:
      pickedCard - The card to add to the player's hand.

    • incrementOwnedResource

      protected void incrementOwnedResource(Resource resource, int numberToBeIncreased)

    • setObjectivesSelection

      public void setObjectivesSelection(ArrayList<ObjectiveCard> personalObjectiveCardsSelection)
      Sets the selection of objective cards for this player.

      This method assigns the given list of objective cards as the player's selection and notifies all registered listeners about the new objective choice with a ReceiveObjectiveChoiceCommand.

      Parameters:
      personalObjectiveCardsSelection - The list of Objective Cards selected for this player.

    • setSecretObjective

      public void setSecretObjective(ObjectiveCard objectiveCard)
      Sets this player's secret Objective Card.

      This method assigns the given Objective Card as the player's secret objective and notifies all registered listeners about the selection confirmation with a ConfirmSelectionCommand.

      Parameters:
      objectiveCard - The Objective Card to set as this player's secret objective.
